item.title: Some GFX I need Rating
item.dc:creator: @FastBallz FastBawlz
item.description:
@FastBallz wrote:

O noo

Almost of these sigs backgrounds are just… Cloud filter

And then the rest is a render and text?

.> Come on at least put a bit of work into creating a sig…

Read full topic

item.title: Some GFX I need Rating
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

.Kaboom:

Delete Photoshop. It looks like you did all those in Paint.

Thats Nice?

[quote=“exe626, post:4, topic:118781”][quote author=.Kaboom link=topic=168156.msg1562455#msg1562455 date=1183357563]
Delete Photoshop. It looks like you did all those in Paint.
[/quote]
Disrespectful…

I’ll give you the following impute.
Text:
-All of your text is a plain color and too big, the text is usually used as an effect or to brand the picture so people know who made it, yet the text draws my attention in all of the posted images.

Backgrounds:
-All of your backgrounds are 1 filter on a color, or a c4d/fractal. You should try making them more complex, try adding light and creating depth.

Render:
-The render(s) you chose in the above images are either just sitting there, or have been tampered with until they don’t look good anymore. When using a render you don’t want to make it look like that, right? You want it to flow with the rest of the piece.

c4d/fractal:
-No, their all out of place or you just used a few and slapped your name on it. Don’t use a c4d/fractal until you know how to use one…

I rate 1/10[/quote]

Thanks For The Tips

im kinda new to gfx

im learning to use c4d

thanks exe neway

Read full topic

item.title: Some GFX I need Rating
item.dc:creator: @exe626 exe626
item.description:
@exe626 wrote:

.Kaboom:

Delete Photoshop. It looks like you did all those in Paint.

Disrespectful…

I’ll give you the following impute.
Text:
-All of your text is a plain color and too big, the text is usually used as an effect or to brand the picture so people know who made it, yet the text draws my attention in all of the posted images.

Backgrounds:
-All of your backgrounds are 1 filter on a color, or a c4d/fractal. You should try making them more complex, try adding light and creating depth.

Render:
-The render(s) you chose in the above images are either just sitting there, or have been tampered with until they don’t look good anymore. When using a render you don’t want to make it look like that, right? You want it to flow with the rest of the piece.

c4d/fractal:
-No, their all out of place or you just used a few and slapped your name on it. Don’t use a c4d/fractal until you know how to use one…

I rate 1/10

item.title: Some GFX I need Rating
item.dc:creator: @javis javis
item.description:
@javis wrote:

in all real honesty i only like a few out of the group.

1: good background but i dont like the pic/render 5/10
2: love everything except the green text 7/10
3: wtf happend lol. it just doesnt flow well at all 3/10
4: this ones pretty good. should have move the render down so it doesnt look like hes cut in half. 8/10
5: 5/10 no comments
6: 9/10 i love this one the most it goes together very well
7: get a little crazy? it doesnt realy have a theme but random. 5/10
8: good job on this one 6/10
9: just render pasted one a black background with text. 3/10
10: 5/10 to bland for me
11: cool fading text but not much going on other wise. 6/10

I think i gave a fair rating. all around id say 5-6/10

Read full topic
